snippet: The Committee on Torture also pointed to a failure to rapidly investigate and prosecute atrocities committed at the end of the country’s 26-year civil war....
lead_paragraph: The Committee on Torture also pointed to a failure to rapidly investigate and prosecute atrocities committed at the end of the country’s 26-year civil war.

headline.main: Torture Is ‘Common Practice’ in Sri Lanka, U.N. Panel Finds

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
